item.title: Trysha add a quote by Rebecca Woolf
item.description: "Thus far the mighty mystery of motherhood is this: How is it that doing it all feels like nothing is ever getting done." -- Rebecca Woolf

item.title: Trysha add a quote by Dean Karnazes
item.description: "Unless you're not pushing yourself, you're not living to the fullest. You can't be afraid to fail, but unless you fail, you haven't pushed hard enough." " -- Dean Karnazes

item.title: Trysha add a quote by Howard Schultz
item.description:
"When we love something, emotion often drives our actions.
This is the gift and the challenge entrepreneurs face every day. The companies we dream of and build from scratch are part of us and intensely personal. They are our families. Our lives.
But the entrepreneurial journey is not for everyone. Yes, the highs are high and the rewards can be thrilling. But the lows can break your heart. Entrepreneurs must love what they do to such a degree that doing it is worth sacrifice and, at times, pain. But doing anything else, we think, would be unimaginable" -- Howard Schultz

item.title: Trysha add a quote by Dean Karnazes
item.description: "How to run an ultramarathon ? Puff out your chest, put one foot in front of the other, and don't stop till you cross the finish line." -- Dean Karnazes

item.title: Trysha add a quote by Lisa See
item.description: "Obey, obey, obey, then do what you want." -- Lisa See

item.title: Trysha add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I'm always happy," Sasha said. "Sometimes I just forget." -- Jennifer Egan
